thread.title: Will Ford
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Will Ford

author: Will Ford
title: Will Ford
text:
Bundle Stars were to me half a year ago another indie throwaway bundle site. "Here's a 10 load of 50p games for Â£1" type stuff.
However, at the tail end of 2016, Bundle Stars have seemed to do a complete 180, offering the best deals of any legit Steam key seller.
Incredible deals in conjunction with a helpful and informative PR team means they will have my money for the significant future.
